profile.title: Kenan Rustamov
profile.subtitle: AI Researcher & Software Engineer
profile.description: I'm a Master's student at Johns Hopkins University conducting AI research at the Center for Language and Speech Processing. With 3 years of experience building scalable, high-performance systems at firms like JPMorgan Chase, I'm super passionate about developing the next generation of intelligent applications!

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science (Thesis)
education.description: Conducting first-author AI research under the guidance of Professor Jason Eisner. My work involves designing and building a novel reactive RAG framework that enables LLM-generated answers to dynamically update as source documents evolve.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Graduated Summa Cum Laude | Dietrich Scholar | Co-founded two university organizations | Placed Top 5 in Pitt Challenge Hackathon
